content: ♥ pdf pattern only - not final product ♥ wanna see more pics of my work please follow me @annaluciadu instagram lace lace dream lace socks a pair of easy and fun lace socks to knit actually knitted socks is one of the most precious presents you can give to your friends and relatives compared to large garments socks are quite easy and fast to knit in this pattern i write instructions using magic loop method you can always ajust it to your own preference either with dpns or short circulars this pdf features in magic loop version
